Nerangs.ab: ... vīspaca vohu mazdaδāta aṣ̌aciϑra āiiese yešti xšnūmaine ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm ka xšnūman nonābar bēd miϑrahe vouru.gaōiiaōitōiš rāmanasca xᵛāstrahe

"... vīspaca vohu mazdaδāta aṣ̌aciϑra āiiese yešti xšnūmaine ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm When it is the šnūman of Nōg Nābar, (they continue with) miϑrahe vouru.gaōiiaōitōiš rāmanasca xᵛāstrahe..."

... vīspaca vohu mazdaδāta aṣ̌aciϑra āiiese yešti. ka xšnūman ī nōg nābar bēd xšnūmaine ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm miϑrahe vouru.gaōiiaōitōiš rāmanasca xᵛāstrahe huuarəxšaētahe tā ō ī aṣ̌a.xᵛāθrahe vīspaēšąm tā frauuaṣ̌inąm aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe ayāb ān xšnūman ī kē bēd dō bār guftan ud sāzišn xūb bē nigerišn bōy ō ī ātaxš dahišn

"At ... vīspaca vohu mazdaδāta aṣ̌aciϑra āiiese yešti, if it is the šnūman for Nōg Nābar, (they should continue with) xšnūmaine ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm miϑrahe vouru.gaōiiaōitōiš rāmanasca xᵛāstrahe huuarəxšaētahe until aṣ̌a.xᵛāθrahe vīspaēšąm until frauuaṣ̌inąm aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe or (else) the corresponding šnūman. They should recite it twice. They have to gaze at all implements carefully and give bōy to the fire."
